Returns: a printable representation of this object.

Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation is equivalent to the following expression: See toString method.

addCookie(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie).Description: Adds an @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@, replacing any existing equivalent cookies. If the given cookie has already expired it will not be added, but existing values will still be removed.

addCookies(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie.Description: Adds an array of @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@. Cookies are added individually and in the given array order. If any of the given cookies has already expired it will not be added, but existing values will still be removed.

getCookies().Description: Returns an immutable array of @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@ that this HTTP state currently contains.

Returns: true if any cookies were purged.
clearExpired(java.util.Date).Description: Removes all of @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@ in this HTTP state that have expired by the specified @B_java#util#Date_E@.
